snippet: Representative Edward J. Markey and Gabriel Gomez differed sharply on issues like banning assault weapons, United States involvement in Syria and abortion rights.
abstract: Democratic Rep Edward J Markey and his Republican opponent Gabriel Gomez, two men vying to fill Senate seat vacated by Secretary of State John Kerry, squabble in tense debate that sharply contrasted their differences on issues.
lead_paragraph: Representative Edward J. Markey and Gabriel Gomez differed sharply on issues like banning assault weapons, United States involvement in Syria and abortion rights.

headline.seo: 2 Vying to Succeed Kerry In Senate Hold Debate
headline.main: 2 Vying to Succeed Kerry in Senate Clash in Debate
headline.print_headline: 2 Vying to Succeed Kerry In Senate Clash in Debate
